item.title: Matplotlib
item.description: Matplot chinese font Problem /home/walter/.virtualenv/python3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/matplotlib/font_manager.py:1316: UserWarning: findfont: Font family [‘sans-serif’] not found. Falling back to DejaVu Sans (prop.get_family(), self.defaultFamily[fontext])) Add Chinese font Add font to system cp simhei.ttf /usr/share/fonts/ttfs/ fc-cache -fv * Add following in program python import matplotlib.pyplot as plt plt.rcParams[‘font.sans-serif’]=[‘SimHei’] or just change ~/.config/matplotlib/matplotlibrc config mpl.rccParams[‘font.sans-serif’]=[‘SimHei’] * clear matplotlib cache bash rm -fr ~/.cache/matplotlib ```
